commit.message:
init.c (__gnat_error_handler): Make msg const.

	* init.c (__gnat_error_handler): Make msg const.

	* gmem.c (convert_addresses): Move declaration ...
	* adaint.h: ... here.
	* adaint.c (convert_addresses): Adapt addrs type to match
	prototype.

	* adaint.c (__gnat_try_lock): Cast pid_t to long, adapt format.

From-SVN: r61887

files.patch:

+	prototype.
